meanings.definition: Very small in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The tiny kitten fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: I found a tiny seashell on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant tried to lift a crumb bigger than itself.
meanings.sent4: Her tiny voice was barely audible in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The tiny pebble skipped across the water's surface.

meanings.definition: Extremely small in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The tiny seed grew into a mighty oak tree.
meanings.sent2: She wore a tiny ring on her pinky finger.
meanings.sent3: The tiny spider spun a web between two blades of grass.
meanings.sent4: In the vast universe, our planet is just a tiny speck.
meanings.sent5: The tiny snowflake landed softly on her nose.
